summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 6.9°C) and outside temperature (down 6.0°C), more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 7%), and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.4 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 595 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1546 m), feels like temperature (up 8.8°C), outside temperature (up 7.6°C), and dew point temperature (up 4.1°C) when compared to today.

Today’s average cloud levels is 594.7m lower than yesterday, 551.9m lower than the past week, 1546.1m lower than the past month.

The cloud levels for yesterday ranged from 1059m to 3380m and averaged 1129.6m, while the past week and month indicated warmer conditions.

summary.summary: Inside; temperature should feel pleasantly mild. Outside; pleasant, mild temperatures. Also, air moisture should feel ok. Drizzle or light rain possible, clouds will occasionally block sunlight, and the light is absent. Low pressure may bring unsettled weather.
